global_attributes.comment: This deployment was designed to help fill the void left by the OOI Central Profiler Mooring (CNPM) & Inshore Profiler Mooring (ISPM) which are typically not deployed to the Pioneer Array in the Summer. The glider will shuttle between two waypoints about 2nmi apart and sample science on the descent of every 15th yo.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 200m Profiling Slocum Glider cp_564
